name: Stay focused!
description: Modifies REDCap behavior after Save & Stay clicked: (1) restores the data entry form to the location where you left off; (2) marks the last field saved; (3) suppresses the post-save 'required fields missing' popup dialog.

versions.1.0.1: June 27, 2024 - major bug fix, minor refactoring
versions.changelog: Fixes bug where the 'stay&save' button was considered a data entry field. Uses localStorage instead of cookies to store last field entered.
